content: Hi! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking for help with heating, cooling, or something else?
Yeah, I think it's something with our AC. It's blowing warm air.
I can definitely help with that! Can I get your name so I can get started?
Thank you, Mike! Could I also get your address to check if you're in our service area?
Great, we do serve your area! Could you tell me when you'd ideally like us to come take a look at your AC? A date and time that works best for you?
Actually, I need to talk to my wife before I can book something. Can I get back to you?

No problem at all, Mike! Please let us know when you've had a chance to talk with your wife, and we can get you scheduled whenever you're ready. If you have any other questions or need a price estimate, just let me know!
reason: Customer wants to confirm with spouse before booking
